channel.title: Comments on: Alex Martelli on Highly-technical Management of Software Development

item.dc:creator: Capacity Planning for Humans | Joseph Scott
item.description: […] This isn’t a new thought. I mentioned that Alex Martelli talked about this nine years ago: […]
item.content:encoded: […] This isn’t a new thought. I mentioned that Alex Martelli talked about this nine years ago: […]

item.title: By: Business Management Classes
item.dc:creator: Business Management Classes
item.description: I agree. My wife and I used to work 55-60 hours a week. We were both miserable, tired and stressed out all the time. We both talked to our employers and got our hours scaled back to 40.
item.content:encoded: I agree. My wife and I used to work 55-60 hours a week. We were both miserable, tired and stressed out all the time. We both talked to our employers and got our hours scaled back to 40.
